message: Let's be fair, Bob.  This offer gives me a slight advantage considering the inflation rates.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's be more realistic.  This offer recognizes the inflation disparity but is fairer to both of us.
Bob, let's be practical. We both lose if this drags on. This offer is a good compromise considering the time pressure.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The longer we wait the less we both get. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point.
